title: Finding The Characteristics
text: Since this parabola is already in standard form, we know that the vertex is $$(-4,2)$$ and that $$p=\frac{1}{5}$$. This means that the focus is $$(-4+\frac{1}{5},2)$$ and the directrix is $$x=-4-\frac{1}{5}$$
